name: Dicey Dungeon (Lotosos)
description:
Welcome to Dicey Dungeon! The rules are simple - survive for as long as you can. 

This is a turn-based strategy game where each decision you make comes with a price. Will you be able to challenge your enemies without shooting yourself in the foot?

The game consists of a duel between two characters, each containing a set of cards they can pick from. Each turn 8 random cards from each of the players are displayed and the 6-sided dice of current player is rolled. 

You are presented with the cards at the position of the number in the dice (a 4 means the player sees the 4th card from both you and the enemy). You now have choice - you pick a card to play against your enemy, while the other card is played against you! When a card is picked, both cards are consumed along with all cards before the number picked - this means that if you pick the card at position 4, for the next turn the cards at position 1, 2, 3 & 4 are discarded and a new list is generated, putting the then 5th card at the beginning and filling out the rest. 

For each enemy you have 5 Rerolls available.
